pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, January 16, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the funeral of the Honourable John Carnell Crosbie.

Anglican Cathedral of St. John the Baptist
16 Church Hill

 Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
